page.title: 09MR. AVERAGE, 1985
page.content:
{ A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MR. P. WOOD}
Mr Wood woke up at 8.30am. and got ready for work. He got his car out of the detached garage and set off. Arriving at about 9.00am, he found that he had got a lot of work on his desk to complete, but at the end of the day he went home, turned on the television, and made a cup of coffee. After he had watched The 6 o'clock News. He went along to the shops to get something to eat. Mr Wood came back 20 minutes later, with some fish and chips. He ate his dinner and, as it was now 7.30, he decided to have a shower and an early night. He went upstairs and got ready for bed. His digital alarm set for 8.30, he jumped into bed, read the evening newspaper, and finally snuggled under his new continental quilt.
